about_the_game:
In The Midnight Town Stories: Matt's Nightmare, you dive into a nightmare where the line between reality and madness blurs. Matt is trapped in a dark spiral of fear and mystery, with no memories and no answers. It’s up to you to guide him through levels filled with secrets buried in the past. Each memory recovered reveals a piece of the truth—but not all truths should be uncovered.

Feel the tension rise as you explore decaying, shadowy environments where horror lurks around every corner. The nostalgic 90s setting only heightens the terror, evoking a lost era amidst the chaos. Prepare to face your deepest fears and discover whether Michael can escape the nightmare—or if he’s doomed to live forever in the shadows of The Midnight Town.

Features:

  • The Midnight Town Stories: Matt's Nightmare is a single-player survival horror game.
  • Matt, trapped in a nightmare, must recover his memories and uncover the truth behind his dark past.
  • Face terrifying environments while solving puzzles and confronting enemies that represent Matt's deepest fears.
  • The story dives into a spiral of mystery and terror, challenging players to reveal buried secrets.
  • Environment design and art inspired by the 90s, creating a nostalgic and unsettling atmosphere.
  • Meticulously crafted soundtrack to heighten the sense of isolation and fear.
  • Players can choose between first-person and third-person perspectives for an immersive horror experience.
  • Fully compatible with Steam Deck, allowing you to take the terror wherever you go.

    Prepare for a psychological horror journey, where uncovering certain truths can be more frightening than remaining in the darkness.

Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 64Bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4590 / AMD Ryzen 5 2600
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 970 / AMD Radeon R9 390
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 9 GB available space
  • VR Support: No
  • Additional Notes: Lower specs may work
